Day 4 of Our Alaskan Cruise- Seeing the Hubbard Glacier ( Don't forget to click on a picture to see a larger version of it)

Heading towards Disenchantment Bay/Russell Fiord
Drops on lens as we head towards Disenchantment Bay/Russell Fiord
Oops- rain is definitely coming

This is looking serious
Naturalist on board assures us it will clear up

Johnnie just doesn't look happy with the chilly rain
But,he's bundled up ready to look
So is Obie- a Gore-Rex shell over a fleece feels warm and cozy
